message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  I'm interested in the product, but I'd be comfortable paying $140.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $155.
Alice, $155 is still a bit high for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $145.  Let's make this happen!
I can see you're really serious about getting this product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I'm counteroffering at $152.50
